HERO.TITLE: Welcome to the world of Café Noir
HERO.P: Where coffee and pastries become art.

ABOUTUS.TITLE: About us
ABOUTUS.P: Café Noir is not just a place, it's an experience. Quality coffee, artisanal pastries, and a modern urban atmosphere await you every time you visit.

PRODUCT.TITLE: Our most popular products
PRODUCT.1_SUMMARY: Indulge in our creamy cheesecake topped with fresh berries.
PRODUCT.2_SUMMARY: A classic latte with a touch of love, perfect for any coffee lover.
PRODUCT.3_SUMMARY: Crafted with the freshest ingredients, our sandwiches are a taste delight.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Reviews
TESTIMONIALS.TEXT2: Café Noir is a truly relaxing place, where every coffee and cake guarantees the perfect experience!
TESTIMONIALS.TEXT3: Their coffee and service are first class.
